item.title: Death by Eye Drops
item.description: A caregiver is accused of poisoning her friend with eye drops. She says investigators got it wrong. "48 Hours" contributor Jericka Duncan reports.

item.title: "48 Hours" show schedule
item.description: True crime. Real justice. To miss it would be a crime.

item.title: Would Michigan investigators be able to prove murder in a case without a body?
item.description: After Dee Warner, a Michigan businesswoman and mother, disappeared from her home, her family believed she has been murdered and suspected her husband ...

item.title: Plane collides with aircraft tug at O'Hare Airport; tug driver critically injured
item.description: The FAA said Air Wisconsin Flight 6181 collided with an aircraft tug while approaching a gate at O'Hare International.

item.title: 2/1: CBS Weekend News
item.description: Medical plane crash in Philadelphia neighborhood kills at least 7; Increasing egg prices have Americans scrambling
